title: 13 Reasons Why Adulting Is The Absolute Worst
text:
Now that I am an adult, I look back and recall all the beautiful moments I had as a child.

Remember when as children we always wanted to be adults and do 'grown up' things? We were naive and did not know how difficult it gets. And every person adulting today can relate.

It is good to have the freedom to live on your own terms but it comes at a cost, a hefty one. Here are some tweets that'll explain how much adulting sucks.

1. I don't remember signing the agreement of responsibility!

Sometimes I don't want to be ther responsible one who works all time to make sure things are paid. #adultingsucks #makethatmoney — Samantha Pairan (@Pumpkinlover_17) October 11, 2019

2. I want money without having to work for it.

You know what I crave for?

Nights where I can stay up past 12 am again. #adultingsucks — Justin Toma (@tomaagotchi) October 9, 2019

3. All in all!

4. Struggle is the synonym for adulting.

Struggle of wanting stability, or saying fuck it and getting a new car 😰🙄 #adultingsucks😩 — too_short ♡ (@cpinedof17) October 10, 2019

5. I'd rather go treasure hunting.

Does anyone want to give me $100 by any chance for absolutely no reason haha I do cash app and Venmo. #adultingsucks — Miss Herrera (@missherrera1211) July 4, 2019

6. Who cares about the tears that come in my eyes doing that?

I don’t even look at my check when I get paid, I just start paying all my bills. #AdultingSucks — Kimaya Walker (@Andrea_kimmie) October 10, 2019

7. I guess that didn't work. Will dying work?

A homeless guy just walked up at me and said “you look so tired, go rest”. I’m hurt coz I wore alittle extra gloss today! #adultingsucks — EfraNce (@effykarungi) October 6, 2019

8. Nostalgia hits...

I really miss the simple life. The only thing we did was be with friends and having a curfew. Having your best friend so close by all the time. Homework that we will procrastinate to do. I should’ve listened to my parents saying enjoy your youth! #adultingsucks — Jordan Humphrey (@jordantenn96) October 4, 2019

9. Putting my self through suffering, intentionally!

Just over here stressing about what I’m going to do this summer and next year!😩 #AdultingSucks — Deven Hunter (@DevenHunter32) April 22, 2019

10. And the day ended with a phone in m hand.

I made 7 calls today which consisted of my only day off #adultingsucks — becs (@htxbecky) October 3, 2019

11. And I have three degrees!

It’s crazy to me that ppl with no job still have more money than I do. & I have a job. #adultingsucks — sarabeth (@SarabethKight) May 20, 2019

12. Injuries remain constant.

Injuries as a kid:

Fell off my bike

Fell out of a tree

Twisted my ankle

Current adult injuries:

Slept wrong

Sat too long

Sneezed too hard

😒😒#AdultingSucks — ModernMummy🎃 (@_themodernmom_) April 21, 2019

13. Good? What is that?
description: Now that I am an adult, I look back and recall all the beautiful moments I had as a child. Remember when as children we always wanted to be adult and do all the adult things? We were naive enough to not know how difficult it gets and every person adulting would relate. It is good to have the freedom to live on your own terms but it comes with a cost, a hefty one.
